app.name: ZIBA
app.description: Safe and reliable ride-hailing for emerging markets. Connect with trusted drivers for affordable transportation.

permissionJustifications.INTERNET: Required for API communication and real-time trip updates
permissionJustifications.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used to detect offline state and show appropriate UI
permissionJustifications.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Required for accurate pickup location and driver tracking
permissionJustifications.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: Fallback location for general area detection
permissionJustifications.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: To restore pending trip state after device restart
permissionJustifications.WAKE_LOCK: To keep screen on during active trips

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ZIBA needs your location to show nearby drivers and set your pickup point.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: ZIBA uses your location to track your trip and provide real-time updates to your driver.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: ZIBA uses your location in the background to provide accurate ETAs and driver tracking during active trips.

storeMetadata.shortDescription: Book safe, reliable rides in emerging markets
storeMetadata.fullDescription:
ZIBA connects you with trusted, verified drivers for safe and affordable transportation. Whether you're a rider looking for reliable transport or a driver seeking earning opportunities, ZIBA provides a seamless platform for everyone.

Key Features:
- Quick and easy ride booking
- Real-time driver tracking
- Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
- Multiple passenger support
- In-app messaging with your driver
- Secure payment processing
- Rate and review your trips
- 24/7 customer support

For Drivers:
- Flexible earning opportunities
- Easy trip acceptance
- Instant payout system
- Performance bonuses and incentives
- Dedicated driver support

For Organizations:
- Trip coordinator accounts for booking rides for beneficiaries
- Organization billing and reporting
- Dedicated account management

ZIBA is committed to safe, reliable transportation for emerging markets. Download now and experience the difference!
